price: 48. Mpe tango bayebisaki bango: Ete bogumbama, kasi balingaki kogumbama te. (тропа Allah)
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرۡكَعُواْ لَا يَرۡكَعُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā qīla lahumu ir'kaʿū lā yarkaʿūna
